Articles.Content:
So now I've decided to start releasing ships again, now that vacation is over. Well, there is a bunch to be uploaded so I'm putting them all in one thread.

First of all, the Ava-1 (by Ace of spades, head aircraft engineer at our company) https://www.dropbox.com/s/qblj1a9h05ar4n9/Plane%20Ava-1.craft

Based off the real airplane. It looks like it can't fly but well...try it and you'll see.

Next, the Koncorde, https://www.dropbox.com/s/ek3g9peyjy42u9p/Plane%20Koncord.craft

the kerbal version of the supersonic airliner. but with much more struts. And more flames.

The UAV-2 https://www.dropbox.com/s/2043eo84rkq3at8/Plane%20UAV-2.craft

is a smaller version of its predecessor, intended for quick, short peeks at Bill Kermans backyard.

The WT-Fudge 3.14159 (265358979323846...) https://www.dropbox.com/s/7rgrydp712ygz1o/Plane%20WTF-%203_14159.craft

It unfortunately does not have anything to do with the circles or food, but it does fly.

The G-1 https://www.dropbox.com/s/8s88a2qi63k1hw6/Plane%20G-1.craft

uses an innovative design that the engineers decided to test.

The Spam-1 https://www.dropbox.com/s/v1k9qx75u8rpk7e/Plane%20Spam-1.craft

utilizes kerbal aerodynamics to fly with not engines, but control surfaces.

Finally, the M-256, https://www.dropbox.com/s/25hxs4dmiciwv24/Plane%20M-256.craft

an ion/aerodynamic powered aircraft which uses two ion engines (but mainly gliding and flapping flaps) to fly in an eco-friendly way (other than the nuclear batteries secretly hidden at the back).

That's it for now, have a great day folks! (credit to ace of spades for the planes)
I'm on the verge of brilliance with maybe a flying mech oops spoilers
